channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: GTA 6 needs to be more GTA 4 than GTA 5 — please Rockstar, make driving cars feel like steering large ships again
item.description: As GTA 6's release gets nearer, I'm hoping Rockstar takes more inspiration from GTA 4 than GTA 5. Here's why.

item.title: Now that's what I call a digital detox 2026 — why finding my fiancé's stash of 90s cassettes is my key to analog happiness this year
item.description: Barely two weeks in, 2026 is already a bit much, so I'm taking one of the things I love most offline this year –my music
